goals__remit: Eurogroup for Animals is a federation of non-governmental organisations, which is committed to improving the way animals are treated and kept throughout the European Union. It uses its scientific and technical expertise to advise on animal welfare issues and encourages the EU and retailers to adopt higher standards on animal welfare.
